amendment.description: To clarify the termination date of the Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3181 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3181 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S2491, S2499; text: CR S2491) To clarify the termination date of the Commission.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3181 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3181 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Byrd.
